name: IpJournalist
brief:
Logging and output management system for Ipopt

Implements a flexible logging framework with multiple output destinations
(Journals) and fine-grained control over verbosity by category.

Print levels (EJournalLevel): J_NONE < J_ERROR < J_WARNING < J_SUMMARY
  < J_ITERSUMMARY < J_DETAILED < J_VECTOR < J_MATRIX < J_ALL

Categories (EJournalCategory): J_MAIN, J_LINE_SEARCH, J_LINEAR_ALGEBRA,
  J_BARRIER_UPDATE, J_SOLVE_PD_SYSTEM, etc. plus J_USER1-J_USER17 for apps.

Each Journal (console, file, stream) can have independent level settings
per category. Printf-style and stream-style output both supported.
see: IpIpoptApplication.hpp for setting up output journals
